titleStmt.title: An ordinance for the bettter [sic] raysing and levying of marinors, saylors and others for the present guarding of the seas, and necessary defence of the realme and other His Majesties dominions. Die Veneris 3. Die Feb. 1642.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Browne, John, ca. 1608-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for I. Wright in the Old baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
